items.sentence: Tom asked Mary for advice about the problem.
Tom hasn't yet told me what need to be done.
Tom has no choice but to do that by himself.
Tom has more experience than the rest of us.
Tom has been driving his wife's car to work.
Tom has been a prison guard for three years.
Tom has an anchor tattooed on his right arm.
Tom has already decided to let Mary do that.
Tom had to do something about it by himself.
Tom got angry when he saw Mary hugging John.
Tom doesn't seem to know a lot about Boston.
Tom doesn't plan on doing that anytime soon.
Tom doesn't need to do that until next year.
Tom doesn't need to be here on October 20th.
Tom doesn't eat meat as often as he used to.
Tom didn't tell us why we shouldn't do that.
Tom didn't show up for work on October 20th.
Tom didn't say when he planned to get there.
Tom didn't really want to do that yesterday.
Tom didn't really want to do that with Mary.
